article.Heading: Tourism CEOs suggested giving land on lease: KJ Alphons, Minister, Tourism
article.Summary: We agree with CEOs of tourism industry that GST rate of high end rooms at 28 percent is very high and we will take up this issue with the Finance Ministry – that's the word coming in from Tourism Minister, KJ Alphons.
article.Body:
We agree with CEOs of tourism industry that GST rate of high end rooms at 28 percent is very high and we will take up this issue with the Finance Ministry – that's the word coming in from Tourism Minister, KJ Alphons.

Watch video for more...
